readable.title: 2502007071_82a8c639cf
readable.content: A group of people in front of a house . A man in stripes , a woman in sunglasses , and a child in a blue hat in front of a brick building . A woman in sunglasses and a blue flowered shirt stands while a boy and a man sit nearby . A woman wearing sunglasses and a flowered shirt looks to the left . Three adults and one child are waiting outside of a building , perhaps a school .
